leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 核科学与核聚变计算生态
leaf_cluster.typical_objects: 等离子体场, 粒子分布, 磁约束几何, 诊断信号, 输运方程
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 建模→仿真→诊断/反演→控制/优化→验证→工作流
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 大型仿真器 + 诊断/反演工具 + 控制/优化 + HPC

unit.unit_name: 数据同化、状态估计与不确定性量化
unit.coverage_tools: DA/UQ、滤波、贝叶斯推断、误差传播

queries: [WEB] uncertainty quantification nuclear fusion tools github

tools.name: SalmonTools
tools.one_line_profile: Useful tools for working with Salmon output
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools to assist in processing and analyzing output from the Salmon transcript quantification tool.

tools.name: Salmon
tools.one_line_profile: Highly-accurate transcript-level quantification from RNA-seq reads
tools.detailed_description: Salmon is a tool for wicked-fast transcript quantification from RNA-seq data. It requires a set of target transcripts (either from a reference or de-novo assembly) to quantify the expression of transcripts.

tools.name: wasabi
tools.one_line_profile: Prepare Sailfish and Salmon output for downstream analysis
tools.detailed_description: An R package to prepare the output of Sailfish and Salmon for downstream analysis, facilitating integration with other bioinformatics pipelines.

tools.name: ESKF
tools.one_line_profile: ROS Error-State Kalman Filter for sensor fusion
tools.detailed_description: A ROS implementation of an Error-State Kalman Filter (ESKF) based on PX4/ecl, performing fusion of GPS, Magnetometer, Vision Pose, Optical Flow, and RangeFinder data with IMU for state estimation.

tools.name: FreeGSNKE
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutive free-boundary tokamak plasma equilibrium simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python code for evolutive free-boundary tokamak plasma equilibrium simulations, used in nuclear fusion research for modeling plasma configurations.

tools.name: AliNe
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow Alignment Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for alignment of sequencing data, processing from fastq.gz to sorted bam files.

tools.name: EFIT.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Reader for EFIT geqdsk files in Julia
tools.detailed_description: Provides routines to read EFIT geqdsk files, which are standard for storing magnetic equilibrium reconstructions in fusion research.

tools.name: GarminCustomMaps
tools.one_line_profile: QGIS plugin to export maps for Garmin GPS units
tools.detailed_description: A QGIS plugin that exports the current map canvas to a .kmz file compatible with Garmin Custom Maps format, facilitating field work and geospatial data usage.

tools.name: ESEKF_IMU_GNSS_Lidar
tools.one_line_profile: Error State Extended Kalman Filter for sensor fusion
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of an Error State Extended Kalman Filter (ES-EKF) for sensor fusion between IMU, GNSS, and Lidar data, useful for state estimation in robotics and navigation.

tools.name: PISCES
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for transcript quantitation and QC using Salmon
tools.detailed_description: PISCES is a pipeline for rapid transcript quantitation, genetic fingerprinting, and quality control assessment of RNAseq libraries, leveraging Salmon for quantification.

tools.name: Dakota Driver
tools.one_line_profile: OpenMDAO driver for DAKOTA
tools.detailed_description: An OpenMDAO driver for DAKOTA (Design Analysis Kit for Optimization and Terascale Applications), enabling optimization and uncertainty quantification workflows.

tools.name: eqtools
tools.one_line_profile: Python tools for magnetic equilibria in tokamak plasmas
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing tools for working with magnetic equilibria in tokamak plasmas, supporting data processing and analysis for fusion research.

tools.name: Minerva
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network tools for land cover data
tools.detailed_description: A package that aids in the fitting and testing of neural network models for geospatial data, specifically designed for use with torchgeo datasets and land cover data.

tools.name: FUSE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated fusion energy power plant synthesis and simulation engine
tools.detailed_description: FUSE (FUsion Synthesis Engine) is a Julia-based framework for the integrated design and simulation of fusion power plants. It couples physics models, engineering constraints, and cost analysis to synthesize and optimize tokamak fusion reactor designs.

tools.name: SALMON-TDDFT
tools.one_line_profile: First-principles electron dynamics simulator based on TDDFT
tools.detailed_description: SALMON (Scalable Ab-initio Light-Matter simulator for Optics and Nanoscience) is a software package for simulating electron dynamics and optical properties of molecules, nanostructures, and solids using Time-Dependent Density Functional Theory (TDDFT).

tools.name: SALMON2
tools.one_line_profile: Development repository for SALMON v2.0
tools.detailed_description: Development version of the SALMON (Scalable Ab-initio Light-Matter simulator) software, focusing on new features and improvements for first-principles electron dynamics simulations.

tools.name: EasyVVUQ
tools.one_line_profile: Library for verification, validation and uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: EasyVVUQ is a Python library designed to facilitate Verification, Validation, and Uncertainty Quantification (VVUQ) for a wide variety of simulations. It provides a unified interface for sampling, execution, and analysis of UQ campaigns.

tools.name: dakotathon
tools.one_line_profile: Python API and BMI for the Dakota iterative systems analysis toolkit
tools.detailed_description: Dakotathon is a Python wrapper and Basic Model Interface (BMI) for the Dakota toolkit, enabling users to configure and run Dakota for optimization and uncertainty quantification tasks within Python workflows.

tools.name: SALMON-Segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for 3D medical image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: SALMON (Segmentation ALgorithm based on MONai) is a PyTorch-based deep learning framework for single and multi-label segmentation of 3D medical images, leveraging the MONAI toolbox.

tools.name: OMAS
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for handling fusion energy data using the IMAS data model
tools.detailed_description: Ordered Multidimensional Array Structure (OMAS) is a library designed to simplify the interface with the ITER Integrated Modeling and Analysis Suite (IMAS) data structure. It allows researchers to store, manipulate, and exchange fusion experimental and simulation data in a standardized format.

tools.name: TORAX
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable tokamak transport simulator based on JAX
tools.detailed_description: TORAX is a physics-based differentiable simulator for tokamak core transport. Built on JAX, it enables fast simulation and gradient-based optimization for fusion plasma control and design, supporting data assimilation and machine learning integration.

tools.name: SALMON
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for survival analysis using multi-omics data
tools.detailed_description: SALMON (Survival Analysis Learning with Multi-Omics Neural Networks) is a tool for conducting survival analysis by integrating multi-omics data through neural networks, aiming to improve prognostic predictions in biomedical research.

tools.name: SalmonTE
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for quantification of transposable elements from RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: SalmonTE is an ultra-fast and scalable pipeline designed to quantify the abundance of Transposable Elements (TEs) from RNA-seq data, facilitating genomic research into repetitive DNA sequences.

tools.name: Chaospy
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical tool for uncertainty quantification using polynomial chaos expansions
tools.detailed_description: Chaospy is a Python toolbox for performing uncertainty quantification (UQ) using polynomial chaos expansions and Monte Carlo integration. It provides methods for creating surrogate models and analyzing uncertainty propagation in physical simulations.

tools.name: Minerva
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based framework for scientific data management and visualization
tools.detailed_description: Minerva is a client/server system developed by Kitware for the management, analysis, and visualization of complex scientific data, often used in geospatial and medical imaging contexts.

tools.name: Minerva Author
tools.one_line_profile: Authoring tool for creating Minerva Story histology visualizations
tools.detailed_description: Minerva Author is a utility to process high-resolution tissue images and generate configuration files for Minerva Story, enabling researchers to create interactive narratives for complex histology data.

tools.name: Minerva Story
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive viewer for complex high-resolution tissue images
tools.detailed_description: Minerva Story is a web-based image viewer designed to make complex tissue images (e.g., CyCIF, CODEX) accessible to non-experts, supporting zooming, panning, and channel toggling for biological data exploration.

tools.name: MinervaChem
tools.one_line_profile: Library for cheminformatics and machine learning in drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: MinervaChem is a Python library developed at LANL for cheminformatics tasks, facilitating machine learning applications in chemistry such as molecular property prediction and drug discovery.

tools.name: QUESO
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for uncertainty quantification and Bayesian inference
tools.detailed_description: QUESO (Quantification of Uncertainty for Estimation, Simulation and Optimization) is a collection of C++ algorithms and libraries for solving statistical inverse problems, Bayesian inference, and model validation in scientific computing.

tools.name: Sandy
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for nuclear data sampling and uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: Sandy is a code for sampling nuclear data files (ENDF-6 format) to produce perturbed files for uncertainty quantification and sensitivity analysis in nuclear physics simulations.

tools.name: QuESo
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for quadrature on embedded solids in finite element analysis
tools.detailed_description: QuESo (Quadrature for Embedded Solids) is a library designed to perform numerical integration (quadrature) on trimmed B-spline elements, supporting immersed boundary methods and finite element analysis in mechanics.

tools.name: UQTk
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight C++/Python toolkit for uncertainty quantification in numerical models
tools.detailed_description: The Sandia Uncertainty Quantification Toolkit (UQTk) is a library of C++ classes and Python scripts for quantifying uncertainty in numerical model predictions. It offers tools for polynomial chaos expansions (PCE), Bayesian inference, model calibration, and sensitivity analysis, specifically designed for computational physics and engineering applications.

tools.name: Dakota
tools.one_line_profile: A multilevel parallel object-oriented framework for design optimization, parameter estimation, and uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: Dakota provides a flexible and extensible interface between analysis codes and iterative systems analysis methods. It contains algorithms for optimization with gradient and nongradient methods, uncertainty quantification with sampling, reliability, stochastic expansion, and parameter estimation.

tools.name: imu_ekf
tools.one_line_profile: Extended Kalman Filter implementation for 6-axis IMU sensor fusion
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of an Extended Kalman Filter (EKF) for fusing data from a 6-axis IMU (3-axis accelerometer and 3-axis gyroscope) to estimate orientation and state.

tools.name: Minerva
tools.one_line_profile: An out-of-the-box GUI tool for offline deep reinforcement learning
tools.detailed_description: Minerva is a GUI tool designed for offline deep reinforcement learning, allowing users to train and evaluate agents using datasets without writing code. It supports various algorithms and visualization of training processes.

tools.name: fishpond
tools.one_line_profile: Differential expression and allelic analysis for RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: Fishpond contains methods for differential expression analysis of RNA-seq data using inferential replicates from quantification tools like Salmon. It handles nonparametric statistics and allelic analysis.

tools.name: rtgsfit
tools.one_line_profile: Real-Time Grad-Shafranov equilibrium reconstruction code
tools.detailed_description: A Python code for real-time equilibrium reconstruction of tokamak plasma using the Grad-Shafranov equation. Developed by Tokamak Energy.

tools.name: robot_localization
tools.one_line_profile: Nonlinear state estimation package for sensor fusion in 3D space
tools.detailed_description: A ROS package that provides nonlinear state estimation through Extended Kalman Filter (EKF) and Unscented Kalman Filter (UKF) for fusing data from arbitrary numbers of sensors (IMU, GPS, Odometry).

tools.name: ikra
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-seq analysis pipeline centered on Salmon
tools.detailed_description: An automated pipeline for RNA-seq analysis that integrates Salmon for quantification, facilitating reproducible transcriptomic workflows.
